name: human-browser
description: Codex-friendly bridge to control logged-in Chrome via extension+daemon

scripts.lint: node --check src/cli/human-browser.ts && node --check src/daemon/app.ts && node --check src/shared/config.ts && node --check src/shared/errors.ts && node --check src/shared/snapshot.ts && node --check src/shared/types.ts && node --check extension/background.js
